name: GeekyWorks
tag_list: seo, website-design, website-development, ecommerce-websites, sem, search-engine-optimization, internet-marketing, ppc, pay-per-click-marketing
overview: We at GeekyWorks are crazy about the Web. Whether it comes on a PC or a smartphone screen. We work on good old PHP and Ruby on Rails to cutting edge tools like Node.js and NoSQL databases. We work to make your site more visible through Search Engine Optimization (SEO)/ Search Engine Marketing (SEM) and more social through Social Media Marketing (SMM). And after being smitten by our smartphones and tablets, we have taken a plunge into apps (and we love it).

offices.address1: Office No. 6, Aditi Commerce, Opp. SBI, Baner Main Road, Baner
